system.description: Effect: The user gains +1 SPD stage for 5 activations. The user also clears any [Hazards] within Rapid Spin's range, and ends any [Trap] attack effects the user is affected by.

actions.name: Rapid Spin
actions.description: Effect: The user gains +1 SPD stage for 5 activations. The user also clears any [Hazards] within Rapid Spin's range, and ends any [Trap] attack effects the user is affected by.
